DOC.brief_title: NeoAdjuvant Chemotherapy Followed Radical Hysterectomy ( OP ) Versus Primary Chemo-RADiation Cervical Cancer FIGO Stage IB2 IIB
DOC.detailed_description: The optimal treatment patient cervical cancer FIGO stage IB2 IIB controversial . There randomized comparison dose-dense NACT ( TP TIP-schedule ) follow hysterectomy LNE ( investigational Arm A ) versus primary chemo-radiation ( standard arm B ) . Primary endpoint DFS 5 year , secondary endpoint local control 5 year , OS 5 year , QOL , questionnaires sexual activity/QOL .
